t: Amazon.com: Brandon Sanderson: Books, Biography, Blog, Audiobooks, Kindle
s: Brandon here with your Weekly Update. First off, you’re here for Stormlight 5, which is, Bing! At 18%, slowly moving up. We are inching along. I had a pretty decent week doing SandoWriMo. This is National Novel Writing Month, and I am posting my word counts every week on my subreddit r/Sanderson.
